title: E18 An Even Worse Eyeball Story and the Adventures of Captain Midnight
description:
DISCLAIMER: this episode is very graphic. And very disturbing.
Em must have known Christine was tired of being the bad guy, because she went NEXT LEVEL with her disturbing story. No joke, DO NOT LET YOUR CHILDREN LISTEN TO EPISODE 18. And if you do, at least put some money aside for their future therapy sessions. 
(Oh and if you’re wondering, this week’s topics are the LaLaurie Mansion and the Craigslist Killer.)
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
